pages.text: Clayworks introduces new building blocks and decorative items using clay. $(br2)Expand your creative possibilities with terracotta bricks, glazed terracotta, and more.
Start by crafting Terracotta Bricks using clay balls and a furnace. $(br2)Use these bricks to build walls, floors, and structures with a vibrant terracotta style.
Combine dyes with Terracotta Bricks to create colorful glazed terracotta blocks. $(br2)Use them for decorative patterns and stylish designs in your builds.
With Clayworks, you can bring a fresh and colorful touch to your Minecraft builds. $(br2)Experiment with the new blocks and find the perfect combination for your next project!
